Nan and her husband are both warm and welcoming, and we can't wait to stay here again!
Beautiful little guest suite with all amenities included. Definitely would stay here again!
Nan thought of every detail and need you might have. Will definitely stay there again!

An Impeccable, peaceful and beautiful place. Super-great hosts with a heart for people. From beginning to end, one is made to feel welcomed. It seems nothing is too good for their guests. If you don’t mind being treated like a King or a Queen, plan to spend some time with Nan & Kurt, You’ll be glad you did. An
Interesting, colorful and lively place to experience…nestled among the trees and the bushes, you’re soon find you have a new favorite place right here in the heart of Hope Mills, NC. Thank you Nan & Kurt; for a time I’ll find hard to forget. It was simply amazing!

Anybody looking for rest and relaxation should definitely check out Nan’s place. It’s just off the beaten path. Always feels like coming home! Nan and Kurt are great host going above and beyond to make sure guest are happy. Will stay again!

Nan and her husband, Kurt, are warm, welcoming and eager to share their local knowledge. Nan offered an alternate route to the airport that avoided a 30 minute traffic jam back to the airport. Absolutely would recommend Nan’s place. Very peaceful and homey feeling the moment you pull in the driveway. Nan is so friendly and greets you when you check in. Will definitely check her availability in the future. Thank you Nan and Kurt!
This was our 2nd time staying at Nan’s place. It’s lovely! The suite is very comfortable and cozy. We plan to stay there whenever we’re in the area if it’s available! 🥰

This was our second visit to Nan’s suite. It’s peaceful and cozy with a magnificent bathroom, a comfortable bed, secure private parking, and lovely surroundings. We look forward to returning on our next trip down I 95. We felt restored when we left!

We stayed at Nan’s beautifully appointed guest suite after a long international flight and welcomed the peace and quiet. The antique-filled decor was lovely and self check-in instructions were clear. We arrived in the dark and were pleased to find the property well-lit with easy secure parking. Highly recommend this cosy apartment with its spacious bathroom and comfortable bed to anyone looking for respite along I-95!
this place was perfect for our one night stay! we were very welcomed by nan and her husband, and they provided absolutely everything we could have needed!
This was a super cool, quiet BnB that I enjoyed so much. Had all the comforts of home. If I'm ever in the area again, I will rebook.
Nan's room was perfect! 10 minutes from I-95 so it was a great great stop for our roadtrip. Very clean with lots of room for stuff and a very nice bathroom.
Charming, comfortable, quiet and warm. Everything is as described in the listing. Nan has added many nice touches to her private suite. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

This was the perfect layover for our trip to the beach in SC. Accommodations were lovely (and spotless). Bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was delicious. Everything we needed. If you are planning to eat dinner there as we did, a tip is to pick some food up at one of the exits along I-95 beforehand as there did not seem to be any restaurants for take out nearby. We would definitely stay here again!
Nan goes on and above most hosts, an artist touch everywhere in the decor, an excellent nights sleep, and breakfast is outstanding.

Lovely home and gardens. Beautiful and clean space. Kind and considerate hosts. The space is attached to their main home, so I could at times hear their TV and talking, thus the 4 star rating. Otherwise 5 stars!
A great safe quiet place to stay.

Fabulous B&B. Besides all the basic criteria being 10s, we felt like we had landed in paradise. The beauty both inside and outside warmed our souls. Nan’s artistic talents, whimsy, and fun spirit shine throughout. And did I mention the yummy muffins? All in all, a 12 star stop!!

This suite is on a lovely property out in the near countryside of Fayetteville, Hope Mills, and Fort Bragg. The amenities and hospitality both are quite generous, and this place makes for a great stay to kick back and slow down a bit! I highly recommend it.
Very comfortable and clean!! The space was Very well thought out. It was the perfect place to stay!

I've been to a lot of places in a lot of countries and this is as close to a home as you will find. Everything taken care of in the most detailed manner. Quiet, clean, comfortable. One of the best mattresses and pillows I've had. The room had everything I needed plus some more. Don't doubt it, just book it. Thank me and everyone else who reviewed later.
After a long day of traveling, I could not have picked a better place to stay. Nan was welcoming and made us feel very comfortable throughout. Highly recommend the breakfast!

I wish I had planned more than a single night's stay at "the art teacher's garden". We really loved this spacious and charming space. Nan thought of everything! The linens were extremely comfortable and soft, and it was so nice to have a choice of pillow to sleep on (as I said, she thought of everything). The coffee was delicious, too. Thanks for a lovely stay!

Conveniently located off of I-95, Nan and Kurt’s guest suite is an oasis for weary travelers. My boyfriend and I stopped there on a road trip and had a wonderful stay - the space was clean, the bed was comfy, and the homemade breakfast was delicious! Nan goes above and beyond to provide all the amenities and services of a hotel for a fraction of the cost. We will definitely be stopping by again!

We had a wonderful stay at Nan's! The bedroom and bathroom are warm and comfortable with many personal artistic touches. Nan and her husband are very friendly and had a great dinner recommendation for us. If possible, I think it is even better than the listing describes. We loved it! Thank you! Almost forgot, the breakfast that Nan offers was delicious! Don't pass on that.

We had a wonderful time at Nan's place - we would have loved to stay longer, but unfortunately we had too little time!
The apartment is so lovely with many cute details, the bed was very comfortable, there's lots of space in the bathroom - Nan put a lot love into the rooms!
It is located in a very quiet and peaceful area and there is a beautiful garden around the house that you are invited to explore.
Nan and here husband are very nice hosts who made delicious breakfasts for us!
Thank you very much! We wish you all the best!

This was the prefect spot to stop as we passed through heading south - a much nicer alternative to a roadside hotel. The rooms were beautifully decorated and very clean. Great place with accurate description, awesome details.
Nan’s Airbnb is very well appointed and Nan is wonderful!! I highly recommend staying in this very quaint place!
A nice cozy place in the country. There are stars in the sky! Nan's accommodations were very comfortable. My husband is still raving about the heated mattress pad.

This place is very nice. The bathroom is huge and has its own little electric fireplace.
We loved the nice firm bed and the many amenities!
Nan's place is conveniently located off I95. Very clean and beautiful amenities.

This is one of the best places we have stayed! The rooms were beautiful and well appointed with amenities. Nancy and Curt were extremely nice, and they were great hosts. The shower is huge and the linens were spectacular. Also, plenty of pillows and a great bed! We required some extra parking, and their space is large and secured with a gate. If in the area, we would definitely stay here again! This is great find along the I-95 corridor!

Had a wonderful stay at Nan's place. It was perfect for a short stay. I had an event at Dirtbag Ales right down the road and was very convenient. There were lots of amenities provided with additional instructions(when needed). My favorite part was the heated mattress pad! The suite was decorated with beautiful artwork and made for a cozy stay. I will certainly stay again!

If I could give 6 stars I would! Nan provided every thoughtful detail that could be offered, so many gracious touches. Don't miss the breakfast option, what a nice touch! We will definitely recommend the teacher's garden to our friends and family that are making the trip north and south.

Nan’s place was perfect for me! I immediately felt right at home there. Everything was perfect! The room was very cozy and inviting and the bed was very comfortable.
I usually struggle with sleeping well when I’m away from home but at Nan’s I slept like a baby.😊

Nan’s place is fantastic - spotlessly clean and very comfortable! The bed was perhaps the most comfortable I’ve ever had at an air bnb and I loved all the pillow options. Breakfast was also great - you request in advance and bring $10 for it. A wonderful and relaxing stay!
Was an absolutely wonderful experience & great space! Gave me the quiet time I was hoping for!

Unequivocally THE BEST Airbnb I’ve stayed in. There are super hostS and then there is Nan and Kurt’s place. It felt like a high end boutique room with an amazing personal art touch. The price was the deceiving part since we only expected a descent place to rest overnight during our final leg home, and we ended up in a place that was the best value one could wish for. I just can’t say how impressed and happy we were, not only at the accommodations, but also getting to meet the hosts. Our only regret was not being able to share more time with them.
Super friendly folks and a wonderful retreat for 1 or 2 guests! The breakfast option (ask the host) for $10 is highly recommended.

Nan’s bnb was a great place to stop for a nite or two. Very relaxing and so much better than staying at a hotel. Very clean and you are away from the noise of the super highways. Definitely would stay again if I pass thru this way. Ok

This place is super peaceful , nice and Mrs.Nan and husband are so nice. My husband and I absolutely loved the room and we were surprised that Mrs Nan made all the artwork on the walls. Nan’s place was wonderful and all we hoped for. It was immaculate and so comfortable and peaceful. Nan and her husband were the perfect host. It was such an important weekend for us celebrating our granddaughter’s first birthday and they made it perfect

This was one of the nicest places we’ve ever stayed at. We were just passing through but wished we could have stayed longer! The room is comfortable and beautifully decorated, the bathroom is huge, and the yard and gardens are beautiful. Also delicious breakfast. The photos included in the listing make it very easy to find and check in, and the hosts are very communicative.
Beautiful space, spacious bedroom and bathroom. Nan was very friendly and communicative. Lovely decorations in the rooms, it felt cozy and Nan made a great breakfast.
it was a very pleasant stay, and both hosts were very attentive and thoughtful.
This place is so clean and peaceful with a lot of hospitality.
What a comfortable, cozy and clean place to stay! Such beautiful surroundings outside with gardens, walkways and trees everywhere. Just a gem!
If you are going to Fayetteville anytime soon, staying with Nan is a must! The room is absolutely gorgeous and private and her property is stunning!
Great place! Very comfortable and quiet!

Nan's place is conveniently located in Enid, OK, & is a quiet oasis on the west side of town. The bed is really comfy & the extra snacks add a nice touch. The private alley back gate entrance is nice to come & go without disturbing the hosts. I hope to stay again in the future.
Perfect place! Easy parking and check in. Nan is very kind and attentive. I had a wonderful night. Strongly recommended.
Expect exponential hospitality and amazing baked goods; the $10 breakfast is worth every cent!
My second visit at Nan's, and not the last. Warm and peaceful, feels just like home.
Great place to stay!
A great break from the noise of downtown. Quite, comfortable, welcoming, and relaxing.
Lovely place!

It’s definitely a luxury suite but so much more than that. Very clean, cozy and comfortable. Nan’s artwork throughout the suite is delightful. This was our first Air B&B we have ever stayed at, and LOVED IT!
It was perfect. Nan & her husband did an amazing job at making us feel welcomed & comfortable.

A beautiful place to stay. Many loving touches in and around the house. Everything you need.

this was a great airbnb for a quick overnight stay driving back from florida... very clean and comfortable. highly recommend!!
Sparkling clean and oh so neat! Loved it!

Very comfortable and clean. Nothing but good things to say about Nan’s. Overall a very nice stay and highly recommended.

Absolutely loved our stay at Nan's. Great space inside and out. Pleasure meeting and talking to Nan. Great covid protocol. Convenient to I 95. Why stay at a chain hotel ? Great hospitality, not too far from I95, super comfort (loved the mattress) and country vibe

Unique, warm, inviting, snug, quiet bucolic setting perfectly located for all I needed to do. This became home for a few days, and was a flawless fit to my needs.
Great hospitality and everything taken care of for you. Perfect spot to stop if you are heading down the I95.
This place is exactly as it's presented. Nan is a thoughtful host with lots of little touches in the room, like bottled waters, coffee/tea, and an option for a super yummy breakfast. Clean and cozy!
Book now!! You be glad you did!
Nan and her husband Kurt were wonderful hosts. Their place was perfect for an overnight stop. Recommend if your traveling the I-95 corridor in NC.
Great hosts and a cozy place!

Nan & Kurt are awesome.. the place is exactly as described, the location is a bit out of Fayetteville town which I knew before hand. The place is very quiet, clean and was just what my partner and I needed for our visit to Fayetteville.

If you are in need of a great place to stay off of I-95 on the way down or back from the south - you definitely need to stay at Nan and Kurt’s place. Their place is prefect with great amenities!!! Nan’s garden kept my husband who loves to take picture of nature very busy.
FYI - make sure you pay the extra $$ to get the breakfast- so worth it. Very yummy.
Wonderful place to stay, had my own little patio and grounds have a beatiful garden of flowers-will be back-

Nan’s place was the most equipped stay I encountered. Quick response and quiet and clean atmosphere.

Nan was an amazing host! She's very personable, the place is beautiful inside and outside with lovely art work that she's made and designed. Such a beautiful suite for a really good price. The bathroom was super spacious, new, and beautiful and the bed was super comfy! Host was accommodating and kind.

From the ease of booking and prompt response to questions before arrival made me comfortable. When I arrived and saw the Art Teacher's artist sign I let ought a sigh and new I was in the right place. This place is amazing! I will start by saying if you work on Ft. Bragg, it's a bit of a haul, but it's worth it. Super duper clean! Very cozy and comfy, the gardens are lovely, definitely take advantage of them and the porch space. I was so relaxed. Nan and Kurt are very friendly, Nans pottery is all around the property and is super unique and interesting. Definitely go for the breakfast, it’s homemade with veggies from their garden! With a muffin and seasonal fruit. The bed is so comfortable and the amenities are really above and beyond. 10/10 would recommend.
My stay was awesome. If you want to get away this is the place. Spa like bathroom and very cozy home. Beautiful garden. Very clean and quiet.
Very nice people, gave good suggestions! Very clean nice little getaway for a bit!

This place was amazing. A hidden gem with amazing service and close enough to get into Fayetteville easily. We felt very safe and loved walking through their garden during the day! Has everything you could need!

Their bnb is so amazing and so comfortable! The bed is as amazing as they claim! We had the best night sleep! They are super sweet and very responsive and took care of everything we needed! I highly recommend this air bnb!!
Nan has a beautiful, cozy home set in a quiet place off the main highway. More amenities than you'll need and the heated mattress is a nice touch.

Nan deserves the tittle of super host. Her space was clean, cozy and comfortable. This was my first Airbnb experience and the bar has been set very high. The mattress was exceptionally comfortable, the room very clean and spacious. I would definitely stay again.

I'm pretty sure these are the nicest people you'd want to meet. Nan and Kurt made me feel very welcome. Their place is just a few minutes off I-95 so very convenient for the interstate traveler. Very nice place. Super comfy bed and the room and bathroom are very clean and well thought out. Nice touches everywhere and really makes you feel like you’re at home. I cannot write enough great things about my stay. The place was cozy and had so many thoughtful touches. It was spotless and comfortable. I would love to come back again in the future!
Nice scenery and clean. I’ll be recommending.
Nan & Kurt were very welcoming. Their place is very cozy & extremely clean. It’s definitely a hidden gem. You can’t beat the price!!

Hosts and rooms like this are why I stay at Airbnbs instead of hotels. Comfortable bed and sparkling clean space. Host was very helpful! Bonus is the room is adorned with beautiful works of art! Great place to stay!
Excellent hosts with a lovely room. The bed was super comfy and there were so many pillows I was in heaven! Recommend!

This AirBnb is a wonderful country stay. Located on a very quiet country road, it is a very spacious and beautifully appointed suite. Next time we are in Fayetteville we know where to stay again.

Nan n Kurt's ABNB is amazing. You couldn't find a nicer place or host than these 2 amazing people. Everything is 1st class. Super Super great stay . I left having two new friends and a great new place too visit. Awesome.

Easy to find because there’s a big lit up sign, super clean room, easy check in, awesome hospitality, rules are easy to find, all the little notes around the house are cute and informative (she even included information on the mattress we slept on!). Perfect stay, doesn’t get any better than Nan’s!

Nan and Kurt were so welcoming and friendly! Everything was clean and the room was filled with everything you could need while traveling. From a fridge and toaster oven to fresh coffee to shampoo in the shower! Very close to a new brewery that I enjoyed going to! Thank you for the wonderful stay!

After a short drive from the main highway, you'll enjoy the quiet country life. Nan and Kurt have a beautiful suite setup for you. The bed is super comfortable and everything is spotless! Plenty of little touches to make your visit feel special!

This is a gem, and the hosts are awesome. One of the best Airbnb I have visited.

Nothing but a wonderful stay!!!
Nan’s place is beautiful from her gardens outside to the touches inside. The bed was comfortable and the breakfast was delicious!

This Airbnb is a gem! It is immaculate, comfortable, quiet and peaceful. It is out in the country but not too far off the beaten path. Bed was comfy, pillows were fluffy and plentiful. Beautiful property, quiet and peaceful place to stay! Simple and clear check in/out procedures. Great communication. Highly recommend staying here.

We felt that we had absolutely everything we needed for our stay- from a morning cup of coffee to shower supplies. We would definitely book again!

When you arrive at Nan's, you will find the space just as advertised! Truly a wonderful place. Beautiful walkable garden with discreet benches overlooking a farm field that is large by NC standards and bracketed by dense woods. Nan and Kurt are great, friendly hosts! The room is bright and comfortable, the bathroom is huge, and their garden is unbelievable!

Our group of three had to cancel our booking at another location and needed to find a place to stay at the last minute. By luck this tiny house had just been listed and even though it had no reviews (at the time) we contacted the host to see if it would be right for our needs and after a quick exchange we went ahead and booked it for two different stays. We were a bit nervous at the idea of being one of the first guests to stay at this location, but we had absolutely nothing to worry about. The property is just a few short minutes off I-95 surrounded by trees and away from all the noise. A code is needed to check in which our hosts sent to us before we arrived and we were able to park directly next to the house itself. A note was waiting for us with a contact number that we actually had to use because we couldn't figure out how to work the tv (which is set up with Roku and Netflix). Not only were the hosts more than happy to help resolve the issue but they wasted no time to get it fixed; when we walked through the door on our second stay the tv was set up and ready to go! There are three sleeper chairs with linens, but an air mattress is offered as a substitute for one of the chairs and a queen sized bed in a separate area can also be used at no extra charge which really goes to show how much the hosts care about the comfort of their guests. There's a kitchenette sink, mini fridge, and stove combo as well as a small microwave and two coffee machines (k-cup and standard). The kitchen provides cups, cutlery, plates, a few cooking utensils, and a convertible table that seats two. The bathroom is roomy, has plenty of towels, and the walk-in shower has consistent hot water with good pressure. What we really appreciated were the small touches such as the snacks/candy on the kitchen table, the waters and sodas stocked in the fridge, the board game in the main area, and the fire wood for the outside pit; on our second stay there were sugars and creamers available as well as body wash and shampoo/conditioner in addition to everything else. However, nothing will highlight how kind and generous these hosts are more than the message we got from them between our stays asking after our well being as they knew we were in Florida at the time Nicole was passing through the state. It was an absolute joy to stay at the tiny house with these hosts and we highly recommend others to stay here whether it's for one night or an extended stay.
